nodes.text: Mashed protatoes was a mashed dish made from protato plants. Prior to its destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign, the eatery named Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant served the dish. It was sold there at 3.5 credits as a dinner side.
Mashed protatoes was introduced in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article which was written by Gregory Walker and formatted as an in-universe menu.
